member.name: T:Eazfuscator.NET.SDK.StackTraceDecoding.StackTraceDecoder
member.summary: Allows to decode stack traces produced by an application which was previously obfuscated with Eazfuscator.NET.

member.name: M:Eazfuscator.NET.SDK.StackTraceDecoding.StackTraceDecoder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Eazfuscator.NET.SDK.StackTraceDecoding.StackTraceDecoder.#ctor(System.IO.TextReader,System.IO.TextWriter,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Eazfuscator.NET.SDK.StackTraceDecoding.StackTraceDecoder.Run
member.summary: Runs the decoding of the stack trace. Encoded text is read from the reader. Decoded text is written to the writer.

member.name: M:Eazfuscator.NET.SDK.StackTraceDecoding.StackTraceDecoder.Run(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Runs the decoding of the stack trace.
